name: A Strange Work Environment
description:
Version 0.1

This game was originally made for the Summer 2019 instance of My First Game Jam.

The game is not yet finished! I ran out of time in the jam and uploaded version 0.1. Once you reach Day 5, you won't be able to get very far. Check back in a couple weeks for a finished version!

Working at a pet store can be stressful. Especially when you're seeing animals and rooms that aren't supposed to be there.

A Strange Work Environment is a short atmospheric horror game made in RPG Maker MV. Survive your shifts, text your friend, and explore a surreal retailscape.
